mapper.select: SELECT gb.GROUPBOARDNO, gb.CUSTNO, gb.TICKETNO, gb.GROUPBOARDTITLE, gb.GROUPBOARDcontents, gb.groupboardImgname, gb.EXPECTMEMBER, gb.APPLICATIONMEMBER, gb.CONFIRMMEMBER, gb.GROUPBOARDSTATUS, gb.BOARDVIEWS, gb.WRITEDATE, cu.custno AS applycustno, cu.custName, gm.memberStatus, COUNT(gm.custno) AS applicationMemberCount FROM groupboard gb JOIN gbmember gm ON gb.GROUPBOARDNO = gm.GROUPBOARDNO JOIN cust cu ON gm.custno = cu.custno WHERE gm.custNo = #{custNo} GROUP BY gb.GROUPBOARDNO, gb.CUSTNO, gb.TICKETNO, gb.GROUPBOARDTITLE, gb.GROUPBOARDcontents, gb.groupboardImgname, gb.EXPECTMEMBER, gb.APPLICATIONMEMBER, gb.CONFIRMMEMBER, gb.GROUPBOARDSTATUS, gb.BOARDVIEWS, gb.WRITEDATE, cu.custno, cu.custName, gm.memberStatus

mapper.update: UPDATE groupboard SET applicationMember = COALESCE(applicationMember, 0) + 1, confirmMember = COALESCE(confirmMember, 0) + 1, expectMember = COALESCE(expectMember, 0), groupboardStatus = CASE WHEN COALESCE(applicationMember, 0) + 1 >= COALESCE(expectMember, 0) THEN '5' ELSE '0' END WHERE groupboardNo = #{groupboardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT g1.custNo, c.custToken FROM GroupBoard g1 left join cust c on g1.custNo = c.custNo WHERE g1.groupboardNo = #{groupboardNo} AND g1.groupboardStatus = '5' UNION SELECT g2.custNo, c.custToken FROM GroupBoard g1 left join GBMember g2 ON g1.groupboardNo = g2.groupboardNo left join cust c on g2.custNo = c.custNo WHERE g1.groupboardNo = #{groupboardNo} AND g1.groupboardStatus = '5' AND g2.custNo IS NOT NULL
